DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess whether radiographic osteoarthritis severity (OA; Kellgren-Lawrence scale) is associated with self-reported improvement in pain after non-surgical treatments (physiotherapy, pain killers, injection, other treatments). The hypothesis is that radiographic OA severity is inversely associated with self-reported improvement.
DOC.brief_title: Non-surgical Treatment of Knee Osteoarthritis - a Comparison of Effects in 2200 Patients
DOC.criteria: Not eligible for at total knee arthroplasty Ipsilateral knee arthroplasty
